Docs.param: Restricts the set of operations returned. Only one specific filter is supported: "status eq 'NotStarted' or status eq 'Running'".
Specifies a non-negative integer n that limits the number of items returned from a collection. The service returns the number of available items up to but not greater than the specified value n.
Docs.summary: Get a list of all import update operations. Completed operations are kept for 7 days before auto-deleted. Delete operations are not returned by this API version.
